general.name: sdss_tiling_polygons
general.description: List of SDSS-I, -II polygons defining the full tiling region. with corresponding geometrical information. This geometrical information is in mangle-type format (see the mangle documentation for a full explanation).

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description:
For IDL users, this file is in a "FITS" mangle format, readable by
the idlutils routine "read_fits_polygons".

header.comment: conforms to FITS standard
array data type
number of array dimensions
migration: description of keyword/column not found. Needs update
migration: description of keyword/column not found. Needs update
migration: description of keyword/column not found. Needs update
migration: description of keyword/column not found. Needs update

hdu1.description:
For IDL users, this file is in a "FITS" mangle format, readable by
the idlutils routine "read_fits_polygons".

XCAPS.name: XCAPS
XCAPS.description:
direction of cap defining tiling
geometry, on unit sphere
XCAPS.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

CMCAPS.name: CMCAPS
CMCAPS.description:
size of each
cap defining the field
CMCAPS.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

NCAPS.name: NCAPS
NCAPS.description:
number of caps (should be 1 for this
file)
NCAPS.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

WEIGHT.name: WEIGHT
WEIGHT.description:
weight for polygon (should be 1 for this
file)
WEIGHT.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

PIXEL.name: PIXEL
PIXEL.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

STR.name: STR
STR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

USE_CAPS.name: USE_CAPS
USE_CAPS.description:
bitmask containing which caps to
actually use
USE_CAPS.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

RA.name: RA
RA.description:
right ascension of point near polygon center in J2000
deg
RA.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description:
declination of point near polygon center in J2000
deg
DEC.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

SECTOR.name: SECTOR
SECTOR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

FIRSTBOUNDARY.name: FIRSTBOUNDARY
FIRSTBOUNDARY.description: index in sdss_boundaries file that this polygon was targeted in
FIRSTBOUNDARY.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update
